"God has committed to our hands a most sacred work, and we need to meet together to receive instruction as to what is personal religion and family piety; we need to understand what part we shall individually be called upon to act in the grand and important work of building up the cause and work of God in the earth, in vindicating God's holy law, and in lifting up the Saviour as 'the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.' John 1:29. We need to receive the divine touch, that we may understand our work in the home. Parents need to understand how they may send forth from the sanctuary of the home, Christian children, trained and educated so that they shall be fitted to shine in the 
                                                                           346
world. We need the Holy Spirit, in order that we may not misrepresent our faith. . . . It is now fully time that an advance move was made in Australia. . . . Let us move forward with well concentrated effort, and overcome every difficulty." [BIBLE ECHO, DEC. 8, 1893.]
